transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Namaste, sir, I’m Vikram from SBI Wealth Growth. We’re offering a once-in-a-lifetime investment in mutual funds with guaranteed 400% returns by next Diwali!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Namaste, Vikram. I have an account with SBI, but I’ve never heard of this scheme. Is this official?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Yes, sir, it’s a premium plan for select customers. You just need to invest ₹1 lakh today. Verify your details at http://sbi-wealthverify.in.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: That website doesn’t look like SBI’s official site. Can you confirm this through my branch?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Sir, this is a limited-time online offer. Branch staff won’t know about it. You must act fast!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’m not sure. Can I call SBI customer care to verify this?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Sir, no need to waste time. Call me directly at 98765-43210 if you have doubts, but hurry, the slots are filling up!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’ll still check with the bank. I don’t want to risk my money.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Sir, you’re missing out on a huge profit. Think about your children’s future. Just transfer the amount now!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’m not transferring anything without confirmation. This feels off.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Sir, I’m warning you, this offer won’t come again. Don’t regret later!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’ll take that chance. Please don’t call me again.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Okay, sir, but I’ll call tomorrow with an even better deal!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: No need. Goodbye.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Hey, Arjun, how’s it going, man?

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Yo, Vikram, all good here! Just chilling after a long day at college. You?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Same, yaar. Just finished a project for my engineering class. Brain is fried!

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Haha, I feel you. Which subject was it this time?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Mechanics, bhai. So many calculations, I almost gave up.

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Been there! But you’re killing it, I’m sure. By the way, did you start prepping for placements?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Not yet, man. I’m thinking of joining some coding classes. Companies are crazy about tech skills now.

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: True that. I’m brushing up on Python myself. Let’s study together sometime, maybe over chai at that stall near Andheri?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Deal! Chai and coding, best combo. How about next weekend?

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Works for me. Let’s plan closer to the date. Oh, and are you coming for the Diwali party at Rohan’s place?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Wouldn’t miss it, yaar. Gotta get some new kurtas for that. You?

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Of course! Already got my outfit ready. Let’s catch up there too.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Cool, bhai. I’ll call you later to confirm the chai plan.

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Sure, take care, man!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Hey, Arjun, what’s up? Been a while!

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Hey, Meera! Yeah, yaar, just caught up with work. How are you?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’m good, thanks! Listen, I need a caterer for a small Diwali get-together. Any recommendations?

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Oh, for sure! There’s this amazing caterer in Thane I used for my sister’s birthday. They do awesome Indian food.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: That sounds great. Do they have veg and non-veg options?

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Yes, both. Their paneer tikka and biryani were a hit at our party.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Wow, my mouth is watering already! How do I contact them?

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: I’ll send you their contact. Just mention my name, they might give a discount.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Thanks, Arjun, you’re a lifesaver! Hey, are you joining us for Diwali?

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Would love to, Meera! Just confirm the date, I’ll be there with crackers.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Haha, awesome! It’s on the 10th. I’ll text you the details.

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Perfect. Looking forward to it. Talk soon!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Take care, bye!

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Bye, Meera!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Heyy, I’m thinking of a quick trip to Kerala during the long weekend.

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Whoa, Kerala? That’s gonna be so serene. Which weekend?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: The one in December, around Christmas. Want a break from the cold up here.

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: I feel you. Delhi winters are brutal. Where in Kerala?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Planning for Munnar. Those tea plantations are calling me!

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Amazing choice. The hills there are unreal. You going solo?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Nah, with my college gang. We’re looking for homestays.

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: That’s the best way to experience Kerala. Try the local fish curry, okay?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Oh, for sure! I’ve heard it’s to die for. Any other tips?

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Yeah, take a shikara ride if you can. It’s super calming.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Will do. Flights are pricey though, almost ₹20,000 return.

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Ouch, that’s steep. Maybe check for deals on MakeMyTrip?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Good idea. I’ll look tonight. Wanna join if it’s not too expensive?

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Tempting, but I’ve got family stuff. Keep me updated though!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Will do. I’ll send pics if we finalize. Talk later?

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Yeah, looking forward to those Kerala vibes. Catch you soon!

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Namaste bhaiya, I’m Rohit from SBI Loan Services. Aapko ₹5 lakh ka loan pre-approved hai, bas ek chhota sa step hai!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Namaste, par maine toh koi loan apply nahi kiya. Yeh kaise pre-approved ho gaya?

transcript.message: Aadhaar number? Yeh toh thoda suspicious lag raha hai. Main kaise bharosa karu?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Bhaiya, tension mat lo, yeh 100% safe hai. Hum SBI ke official partner hain. Aap yeh link check karo: http://sbi-loanverify.in.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Link? Main koi link pe click nahi karta. Aap mujhe apna official number do, main SBI customer care se confirm kar lunga.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Arre bhaiya, customer care se kyun time waste karna? Yeh offer sirf aaj tak hai. Call karo is number pe: 98765-43210, aur details confirm karo!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Nahi bhai, mujhe yeh safe nahi lagta. Main apni details nahi dunga.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Bhaiya, socho, Diwali pe ghar ke liye kitna kaam aa sakta hai yeh loan. Bas 5 minute ka process hai!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Nahi, mujhe koi jaldi nahi hai. Main pehle confirm kar lunga. Aap call mat karna ab.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Hey, bro, what’s up? Been ages since we chatted!

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Arre, yaar, I know! Just been swamped with work. How are you, man?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: All good here. Just chilling in Mumbai, missing our old hangouts. You free this weekend?

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Hmm, let me check. Diwali prep is on full swing at home, but I can squeeze in some time. What’s the plan?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: How about catching a movie at PVR? There’s this new Bollywood flick everyone’s talking about.

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Sounds good! Is it that one with Ranbir Kapoor? I’ve been wanting to watch it.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Exactly that one! Let’s book tickets for Saturday evening. Cool with you?

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Perfect. And after, we can grab some vada pav near Marine Drive, na?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Arre, now you’re talking! Nothing beats street food in Mumbai. I’m already drooling.

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Haha, same! Alright, I’ll confirm with the missus and text you by tomorrow.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: No worries, take your time. Just don’t back out last minute like last time!

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Haha, promise I won’t. Catch you soon, bro!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Hey, Neha! How’ve you been?

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Hey, Riya! I’m good, just chilling. What about you?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: All good here. Listen, I was thinking we should plan a movie night soon. It’s been ages!

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Oh, totally! I’m so up for it. Maybe this weekend?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Perfect. Let’s do Saturday evening. I’ll get some snacks—how about samosas and chai?

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Yum, that’s a must! I’ll bring some mithai too, since Diwali is around the corner.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Nice! Let’s watch something light, maybe a Bollywood rom-com?

transcript.speaker: person 2

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Agreed. I’ll text her. Can’t wait for this!

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Same here! It’s gonna be so much fun. See you soon!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Hey, dost, you free for a quick chat? Got some updates on the Bangalore project.

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Hey, yaar! Yeah, I’ve got a few minutes before my next call. What’s up?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: So, I just had a meeting with the team. We’re ahead of schedule by a week!

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Seriously? That’s amazing, bhai. How’d you manage that?

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Extra hours and a lot of coffee, man. The client is super happy, though.

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: That’s what matters. You in Mumbai next week? We should celebrate.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Yeah, I’ll be there on Tuesday. How about some vada pav at Gateway?

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Arre, you read my mind! Let’s do it. I’ll call up a few others too.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Cool, make it a small gang. By the way, how’s your workload these days?

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Hectic, yaar. Got a deadline before Diwali, so no rest for me.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Hang in there, bhai. After Diwali, we’ll plan a proper chill session.

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Can’t wait for that. Alright, I gotta jump on this call. Tuesday, Gateway, done!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Done, man. Talk soon. Bye!

transcript.speaker: person 2
transcript.message: Bye, take care!

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Namaste madam, this is Amit Kumar from Aadhaar Verification Center. Your Aadhaar card has been flagged for suspicious activity.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Namaste, Amit ji. Flagged? I haven’t done anything wrong. What’s the problem?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, someone has linked your Aadhaar to multiple bank accounts without your permission. You must update your security details immediately.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Multiple accounts? That’s shocking! How do I know this is genuine?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, this is an official call. Please visit http://aadhaar-safeupdate.co.in and enter your details to block unauthorized access.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’ve heard of scams like this. Why can’t I just go to the Aadhaar center near my house?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, the centers are closed for Diwali preparations. If you don’t update online by tonight, your Aadhaar will be deactivated, and you’ll lose access to government schemes.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Deactivated? That’s serious. But I’m not comfortable with online links. Can you send me a letter or email?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, there’s no time for letters. Hackers are active 24/7. Just share your Aadhaar number with me, and I’ll fix it for you.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: No, I’m not sharing anything over the phone. I’ll check with the official Aadhaar helpline.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, you’re risking everything! Call this number for confirmation: 1800-222-3344, but do it after updating the link.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I don’t think so. I’m hanging up and reporting this number.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Madam, wait! You’ll face penalties if you ignore this warning!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’m not falling for this. Goodbye.

transcript.speaker: person 1

transcript.speaker: person 1

transcript.message: Arre, same yaar. Weekend pe thoda relax kar raha hoon. Mumbai ki traffic se thak gaya hoon.

transcript.message: Haha, woh toh hai. Kabhi kabhi lagta hai chhoti jagah shift kar loon. Koi plan bana rahe ho?

transcript.message: Haan, soch raha hoon next month ek short trip pe jaoon. Goa ya koi hill station. Chalegi?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Namaste ji, this is Vikram from SBI Customer Care. Sir, there’s an urgent issue with your account.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Namaste, Vikram. What’s the problem with my account?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Sir, we’ve detected unauthorized transactions on your SBI account linked to your Aadhaar. You need to secure it immediately.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Unauthorized transactions? I haven’t noticed anything unusual. Can you explain?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Sir, it’s a fraud attempt. Someone is trying to withdraw ₹50,000. Please visit http://secure.sbi-verify.com and update your details now.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: That sounds serious. But why do I need to go to a website? Can’t you help over the phone?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Sir, it’s bank policy for security. Time is critical, or you’ll lose your money. Just click the link and verify.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’m not sure about clicking links. Can I visit the branch instead?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Sir, branches are closed due to Diwali holidays. This is the only way to save your savings. Please trust me.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Hmm, I’ll call the official SBI helpline to confirm this. What’s your employee ID?

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Sir, my ID is SBI-VK123. But there’s no time for calls. Your account is at risk right now!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I appreciate the urgency, but I’ll verify this with the bank directly. Thanks for the heads-up.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Sir, please don’t delay. Every second counts. Just open the link and secure your account!

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: I’ll handle this through official channels. Goodbye.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Namaste, sir, this is Rohit Sharma calling from SBI Fraud Department. Your account has been compromised.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Namaste, but how is that possible? I haven’t shared my details with anyone.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Sir, a hacker has accessed your account. ₹50,000 is at risk. You need to verify your identity urgently on http://secure.sbi-verify.com.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: Wait, I’ve never heard of such a website. Is this legitimate?

transcript.message: Absolutely, sir. It’s SBI’s official portal. If you don’t act now, your money will be gone by tonight.

transcript.speaker: person 1
transcript.message: But why can’t I just visit the branch? I live near the SBI branch in Malviya Nagar.

transcript.speaker: scammer
transcript.message: Sir, you’re making a big mistake. Call 9123456789 if you reconsider!

transcript.speaker: person 1

transcript.message: Namaste, this is Vikram from SBI Fraud Department. Your account has been compromised.

transcript.speaker: scammer
